ygData.subject: Re: The first new char
ygData.msgSnippet: I would say you re going a bit too far with the teleporting, yeah. Other than that, trying to expell bots to Mars sounds like an interesting storyline. But I

I would say you're going a bit too far with the teleporting, yeah. 
Other than that, trying to expell bots to Mars sounds like an 
interesting storyline.

But I do have a big problem with the teleporting.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Ah, did ever feel good to read messages again. Anyway, here's my 
> first new char. He could cause major problems for this RPG. And as 
> for Alloran taking Vulois and Starscream, it's fine. But since 
Vulois 
> was my first char, I would like to stay close to his story line. 
> Alloran, check your e-mail. And Dachande, thank you very much for 
> giving me control of your RPG. Soulstice told me. Now, everyone 
who's 
> apart of it, go read the message board. In a few minutes there's 
> gonna be a message because we'll be changing the head story a bit. 
Ad 
> in the process we'll be ending all controversy about the link 
between 
> the RPG's. But I won't tell you how. That's members only. Well, 
here 
> I go. I may be rusty, so bare with me. This is the first two of my 
> chars. I'll be introducing a new one every day.)
> 
> Lincox/ S.B 92Delta
> 
> Lincox sat on his ship, about to leave Cybertron. He couldn't 
believe 
> the orders he was given when the Maximal council talked to him. He 
> thought he was dead!
> 
> *Begin Flashback*
> 
> Lincox, who has just been conviceted of stealing weapons, is 
brought 
> before the Maximal council.
> 
> "Lincox, normally we would put you away for life for what you did. 
> But...we think you can redeem yourself. We have a special mission 
for 
> you. Of course, you've heard of the Neo Beast Wars. We'll, we've 
got 
> a problem. Here on Cybertron, all the fanctions have an eerie but 
> unstable peace. On Past Earth though, it's a full out massacre. 
They 
> have forgotten their mission to collect Energon. The Preds and us 
> wish to send down a peaceful mining team, with no weapons of any 
> kind. But if we sent it while the war is going, everyone would be 
> attacking it for the peace it represents. And you can't just stop a 
> war. So we've made a ship, with the most powerful teleporter ever, 
so 
> powerful that it can teleport across time. We want you to take this 
> ship, and go to Earth, and teleport everyone on the planet, to 
> present day Mars. Of course, the humans have tereformed it so that 
> animals can and are living on it, but no humans have volunteered to 
> go live there yet. In 90 of their days they will be forcing people 
> on. We want all the bots on it in 60. Also, don't just sit around 
for 
> the 60. You have a lot to do. The Ark is in the wrong place. The 
> Autobots and Decepticons are missiong. Bases that have never been 
> discovered on Earth are there. Destroy them. Move the Ark. Find our 
> ancestors. The mining team could do it, but that would delay the 
> mining for two months. We will be sending Surveillance Bot 92Delta 
> with you, so you don;t get up to any illegal things. In 60 from 
when 
> you hit Earth, the teleporter will automatically send all bots 
> outside of the ship to Present Mars. Make sure you are in the ship 
> when it happens. That is all. You must leave immediatly. You have 5 
> mega-cycles. Get to it."
> 
> *End Flashback*
> 
> Lincox reved the engines and looked at S.B 92Delta
> 
> "Ready to go?"
> 
> "Affirmitive. All Systems are ready for take off."
> 
> "Than let's hit the skies!!"
> 
> Lincox hits Maximum speed, and takes off for Past Earth.
> 
> (I know awhile back we had a disscusion about the use of 
> transporters, so If I'm breaking a rule here tell me, cause I can 
> change it.)
